value.title: David M. Shribman: Pence hasn't gone away
value.excerpt: Mike Pence is determined not to be the modern version of William R. King, William A. Wheeler or Charles W. Fairbanks.

value.title: Pence eyes his political future as he tries to make peace with Trump
value.excerpt: Six months after their relationship deteriorated in the midst of an insurrection at the US Capitol, Donald Trump and Mike Pence appear to be on the mend.

value.title: Why Mike Pence’s speech was really important, and what it says about 2024
value.excerpt: The former vice president well received speech was interrupted by numerous standing ovations by the sold out crowd of conservative activists and leaders, but most importantly, he gave his most extensive comments to date about the deadly Jan. 6 insurrection at the U.S. Capitol.

value.title: Trump: 'Too soon to tell' if Pence would be running mate if he seeks White House in 2024
value.excerpt: Former President Trump Donald Trump Trump touts record, blasts Dems in return to stage Trump demands China pay 'reparations' for role in coronavirus pandemic Trump endorses Rep. Ted Budd for ...

value.title: Ted Lieu Doesn't 'Understand Why Mike Pence Is Even Talking' To Donald Trump After Capitol Riot
value.excerpt: "Mike Pence didn't have the courage to do what should have been done to protect our Country and our Constitution," Trump tweeted as Capitol rioters chanted "Hang Mike Pence."

value.title: Pastor Greg Locke Calls Mike Pence 'Judas' Following Speech on Capitol Riot
value.excerpt: Pence told a Republican fundraiser in New Hampshire that he and Donald Trump disagreed about the January 6 riot.

value.title: Pence: I'll likely never see eye to eye with Trump on Jan. 6
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence says he isn't sure he and former President Donald Trump will ever see “eye to eye” over what happened on Jan_ 6 but he will “always be proud of what we accomplished for the American people over the last four years.

value.title: Pence says he and Trump don’t ‘see eye to eye’ on Jan. 6 — but GOP ‘must move forward’
value.excerpt: In a speech in New Hampshire, former Vice President Mike Pence urged Republicans to move forward following the Capitol riot.

value.title: In a speech to a New Hampshire G.O.P. group, Pence calls systemic racism a ‘left-wing myth.’
value.excerpt: Mike Pence also distanced himself from President Donald J. Trump, saying of the Capitol attack, “I don’t know if we’ll ever see eye-to-eye on that day.”

value.title: Pence, targeting critical race theory, declares ‘America is not a racist nation’
value.excerpt: During a trip that sparked more 2024 speculation, former Vice President Mike Pence dived directly into the latest battleground in the nation’s culture wars, as he took direct aim at critical race theory and spotlighted that “America is not a racist nation.”

value.title: Pence returns to another key early presidential voting state
value.excerpt: Mike Pence is returning to another key early presidential voting state as he's set to give a speech Thursday evening in New Hampshire

value.title: Mike Pence tweets that he and his wife will attend the Indy 500
value.excerpt: The former vice president tweeted Friday afternoon that he'll be among the race's 135,000 attendees this year.

value.title: Mike and Karen Pence Purchase New Home Near Indianapolis: 'Good to Be Back'
value.excerpt: Mike and Karen Pence are excited to be moving back to Indiana, after months of crashing with family and renting a home since leaving the White House. The former vice president, 61, and second lady ...

value.title: Fact Check-Mike Pence was not ‘shot while fleeing military arrest’ on April 14
value.excerpt: Posts sharing information that former Vice President Mike Pence was shot while fleeing military arrest are false. There is no credible evidence to support this claim.

value.title: Former VP Pence to speak at Michigan Republican conference
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence will be among the speakers at a gathering of Michigan Republicans on Mackinac Island this fall.

value.title: Mike Pence Rebukes Joe Biden's Tax Plan, Says China Will Benefit While US Faces Economic Catastrophe
value.excerpt: In a Monday op-ed, Pence claimed corporations will flock to China, which "stands to gain thousands of jobs as U.S. employers flee the crushing taxes" proposed by Biden.

value.title: Pence trips spark further 2024 White House race speculation
value.excerpt: In a move that will spark further 2024 speculation, former Vice President Mike Pence will headline a major Republican Party dinner and fundraising event in early June in New Hampshire, the state that for a century has held the first primary in the race for the White House.

value.title: Pence to headline New Hampshire event in June
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence will headline a campaign event in New Hampshire next month, fueling speculation that he may run for the White House.

value.title: Mike Pence coming to Texas for GOP fundraising blitz, donor appreciation event
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence and several other potential 2024 presidential candidates are descending upon Texas next week to thank donors to the 2020 campaign here and to help raise money to flip the U.

value.title: Eyeing 2024, Pence says he'll push back on 'liberal agenda'
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence, positioning himself for a possible return to elected office, told an audience in early-voting South Carolina that he will spend the coming months “pushing back on the liberal agenda” he says is wrong for the country.

value.title: Pence touts "our" accomplishments in first remarks since leaving office
value.excerpt: In speaking to the Palmetto Family Council, a South Carolina social conservative Christian group, Pence criticized Mr. Biden for what he called "an avalanche of liberal policies."

value.title: Mike Pence is returning to the public eye today — and insiders say it could foreshadow a 2024 presidential run
value.excerpt: Mike Pence is plotting a return to public prominence, employing a methodical approach that's a hallmark of his career in politics.

value.title: Pence reemerges in South Carolina as he weighs 2024 bid and navigates relationship with Trump
value.excerpt: When Mike Pence underwent heart surgery earlier this month, he had alerted only a few family members and aides beforehand. Several onetime Pence aides were caught off guard when he released a statement that after experiencing "symptoms associated with a slow heart rate" for two weeks, the former vice

value.title: Pence to target Biden in first post-vice presidency speech
value.excerpt: It’s no coincidence that former Vice President Mike Pence’s first speech since the end of Donald Trump’s administration comes on the same day that President Biden marks his first 100 days in office.

value.title: Pence Simon & Schuster book deal sparks war of words inside company
value.excerpt: The employee petition demanding Simon & Schuster cancel former Vice President Mike Pence's two-book deal is a sign of a growing political divide within an industry founded on freedom of speech, observers say.

value.title: Pence makes foray back into political debate with speech to S.C. conservatives
value.excerpt: The former vice president is going to a key presidential nominating state to launch his critique of Biden's first 100 days.

value.title: Uproar over Mike Pence's memoir highlights growing conflicts in publishing, experts say
value.excerpt: When the publishing giant Simon & Schuster recently announced it would release former Vice President Mike Pence’s autobiography, the decision evidently infuriated rank-and-file workers, who reportedly submitted a petition demanding the company stop ...

value.title: Pence hits Dems over border crisis, touts Trump's success stemming illegal immigration
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday hit President Biden and Democrats for the escalating crisis at the southern border, while touting the Trump administration’s reduction of illegal immigration -- saying Biden inherited "the most secure southern border in American history."

value.title: Mike Pence: 'Worst border policy in history'
value.excerpt: The situation is more than complex on the southern border these days. U.S. Customs and Border Protection offers this update:

value.title: Kamala Harris cited Russian bounty story in general election debate with Pence
value.excerpt: Vice President Harris cited the now-backpedaled report of Russia placing bounties on the heads of U.S. soldiers during a general election debate in October with former Vice President Mike Pence.
